name: Slime Survival! - A game made by Chagic
name_original: Slime Survival! - A game made by Chagic
description:
Hi! This is my first time participating in a game jam so I hope you guys enjoy my game! :D

The little boy had been sent on a mysterious journey… but now the Slime King is attacking him! Oh no! There are slime all over the place. How long can you survive until the world is flooded with slimes?

Controls:

WASD / Arrow keys to move around

Click to attack with your little sword :)

*Btw I made this project SPECIFICALLY for this game jam - so I didn’t cheat! ;) All the things are made within the time limit.

I’m really proud because all the art, coding, and even the MUSIC is all made by myself! Hope you like them!
